query.name: organizationGroupByPositionId
query.jpql: select o from base$OrganizationGroupExt o where o.id in (select p.organizationGroupExt.id from base$PositionExt p where p.group.id=:positionId )

query.name: personGroupByFullName
query.jpql: select o from base$PersonGroupExt o where o.fullName=:fullName )
